app.name: Spritetest
app.long_description: This is a simple sprite demonstration of the position, zoom and rotation functions of libwiisprite. Point your wiimote at the screen to move and rotate the sprite. Press + and - to make the sprite zoom in and out or press A and B to make the sprite zoom in and out. You can stretch the sprite in the background with the directional pad. There are two textures used in this demo. One is loaded from SD Card, the other one is loaded from compiled-in data
